targets.expr: sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod=~"^prometheus-kube-prometheus.*$", namespace=~"monitoring.*", container!~"POD",container!="", id!="/", source_cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (container,pod)
sum (container_memory_working_set_bytes{pod=~"^thanos.*$", namespace=~"monitoring.*", container!~"POD", container!="", source_cluster=~"$cluster"}) by (container)
